title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente.
Whisk together eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Drain the pasta and mix with pancetta.
Stir in the egg mixture off heat and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Simmer tomato puree in a pan with spices.
Add grilled chicken and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and serve with rice or naan.
